summary: The module implements a metric that leverages a language model to compare generated SQL statements with reference queries, producing a similarity score that reflects their semantic equivalence. It integrates with the RAGAS metric framework as a single‑turn evaluation component.
business_intent: Enable organizations to automatically assess the correctness and relevance of AI‑generated SQL code, ensuring that generated queries faithfully represent the intended data retrieval logic and improving the reliability of LLM‑driven data access solutions.
